page.title: 18HOME LIFE IN DELABOLE
page.content:
{Pets:Survey results.} By Samathe Brock and Caroline Squire. In the 55 families of the children in our school,there are 209 budgies,51 goldfish,66 cats,35 dogs, 19 rabbits,9 chickens,5 gerbils, 3 terrapins,2 goats,2 finches and 1 other bird,2 tortoises,1 horse.
{ "Pets." }By Kerry Ubly. Once I had a golden retriever called Merlin but we had to get rid of him, so we gave him to a friend. Before him I had two cats called Hobby and Misty.They both ran away.Before that I had a grey rabbit called Smokey.He died.But I still have two cats called Sandy & Lucy and lots of fish.
